SELECT b.*, a.`acc_name`, a.`acc_id`, a.`acc_state`, a.`province_no`, a.`acc_thumbs`, c.`room_checkIn`, c.`room_checkOut`, b.`res_checkIn`, b.`res_checkOut`, b.`res_state`, IFNULL(d.`arti_no`, 0) AS diaryStat, IF(e.`res_no` IS NULL , 0, 1) AS reviewStat FROM `lemo_product_accommodation` AS a LEFT JOIN `lemo_product_reservation` AS b ON a.`acc_id` = b.`acc_id` LEFT JOIN `lemo_product_room` AS c ON b.`room_id` = c.`room_id` LEFT JOIN `lemo_diary_article` AS d ON b.`res_no` = d.`res_no` LEFT JOIN `lemo_product_review` AS e ON b.`res_no` = e.`res_no` WHERE b.`user_id` = #{user_id} ORDER BY b.`res_date` DESC LIMIT #{offset}, 10;

SELECT a.*, b.*, c.*, IFNULL(d.`dis_price`, 0) AS `dis_price`, IFNULL(e.`poi_point`, 0) AS `poi_point` FROM `lemo_product_reservation` AS a LEFT JOIN `lemo_product_room` AS b ON a.`room_id` = b.`room_id` LEFT JOIN `lemo_product_accommodation` AS c ON a.`acc_id` = c.`acc_id` LEFT JOIN `lemo_member_coupon_log` AS d ON a.`res_no` = d.`res_no` LEFT JOIN ( SELECT `res_no`, `poi_point` FROM `lemo_member_point_log` WHERE (poi_content IS NULL OR poi_content IN ('포인트 사용')) ) AS e ON a.`res_no` = e.`res_no` WHERE a.`res_no` = #{res_no} AND a.`user_id` = #{user_id};

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `lemo_member_point_log` (`user_id`, `res_no`, `poi_point`, `poi_content`,`poi_maximum`, `poi_rdate`) SELECT poi.user_id, #{res_no}, -poi.poi_point, '포인트 반환', poidSave.poid_maximum, NOW() FROM `lemo_member_point_log` poi JOIN `lemo_member_point_detail_log` poid ON poi.`poi_id` = poid.`poi_id` JOIN `lemo_member_point_detail_log` poidSave ON poid.`poid_save_id` = poidSave.`poid_id` WHERE poi.`res_no`= #{res_no} AND poi.`poi_point` < 0 AND poi.`user_id`=#{user_id} LIMIT 1;

INSERT INTO `lemo_member_point_log` (`user_id`, `poi_point`, `poi_content`, `poi_maximum`, `poi_rdate`) SELECT poi.`user_id`, -SUM(poid_sub.poid_point), '포인트 만료', poi.poi_maximum, NOW() FROM `lemo_member_point_log` poi JOIN `lemo_member_point_detail_log` poid ON poi.poi_id = poid.poi_id JOIN `lemo_member_point_detail_log` poid_sub ON poid.poid_id = poid_sub.poid_save_id WHERE poi.`user_id`=#{user_id} GROUP BY poid_sub.`poid_save_id` HAVING SUM(poid_sub.poid_point) > 0 AND poi.poi_maximum < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d');
